mapper.select: SELECT NVL(SUM(t.ticket_price),0) FROM sales s, ticket t WHERE s.ticket_id = t.ticket_id AND s.sales_status != 'ready' AND s.payment_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate}||'000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS') AND TO_DATE(#{endDate}||'000000', 'YYYYMMDDHH24MISS')

SELECT SUM(t.ticket_price) as count, to_char(payment_date,'YYYY-MM') as payment_date FROM sales WHERE payment_date >= #{startDate} AND payment_date < #{endDate}
GROUP BY to_char(payment_date, 'YYYY-MM')
